title: SCP-3008-2

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Trap someone in your Ikea, roleblocking them for the night.
-Once per game, close your Ikea, dealing an Unstoppable Astral Attack to everyone that has previously been locked in your Ikea.

desc:
Post 1703
*The Ikea is closed. Please come back tommorrow.*
Roleblock Immune
